# 1. Creare a Cognito User Pool and integrate with API Gateway
## 1-1. Follow this guide
http://docs.aws.amazon.com/apigateway/latest/developerguide/apigateway-integrate-with-cognito.html
* Create a User Pool
* Integrate an API with a User Pool

# 2. Authenticate agianst the Cognito User Pool from 1-1
## 2-1. Sign up a user
```
$ node signup.js
```

## 2-2. Confirm a user
```
$ node signupConfirm.js
```

## 2-3. Login with the user and get tokens
```
$ node login.js
```
